alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 6:56PM CDT until May 06 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Thedford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brownlee, Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River and Highway 83 crossing Goose Creek. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 157 and 189. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
